key.name: auto-focus
key.description: If notes should automatically take the keyboard focus when hovered by the cursor. Otherwise a click is needed.

key.name: layout-position
key.summary: Layer on which the notes are displayed
key.description: Possible values are "above-all", "on-background", or "cycle-layers". The idea of "cycle-layers" is that clicking on the icon sends the notes above all if they were on the background, and vice versa; notes are hidden between the foreground and the background (3 states).

key.name: first-note-rgb
key.description: The color for the very first note, all following note creations will use the color of the parent note.

key.name: use-shortcut
key.description: If the keyboard shortcut should be active

key.name: notes-kb-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut which shows or hides notes.

key.name: hide-icon
key.description: Should be true only if there is shortcut.

key.name: use-layer-shortcut
key.description: If the keyboard shortcut should be active

key.name: notes-layer-kb-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut which toggles layer of notes.

key.name: ugly-hack
key.description: This setting is used to call an extension.js method from prefs.js
